GetBuildingUpgrades(uint256,uint256).return: _RequiredBuilding Required Building ID to Upgarde_RequiredLevel Required Building Level to Upgrade_RequiredGold  Required Gold to upgrade_RequiredElixr Required Elixr to upgrade_RequiredGem Required Gem to upgrade_GoldRate Change in gold production rate_ElixrRate Change in elixr production rate_GemReward amount of gem reward to user_Time Cool off time to next Upgrade

GetBuildings().return: _id array of Builing IDs _name array of name of builings_image array of swarm hash of builings

GetFilledSellOrders().return: village address listseller address listbuyer address listsell price list

GetToopsDetails(uint256).return: _Defence Change in Defence power_Attack Change in Attack Power_Steal Change in Steal power_RequiredGold  Required Gold to upgrade_RequiredElixr Required Elixr to upgrade_RequiredGem Required Gem to upgrade_Time Time Required to upgrade troop

GetTroops().return: _id array of troop IDs_name array of name of troop_image array of swarm hash of troop

params._position: Village position on User Town list

depositGems(uint256).details: Note: Remember to call Token(address).approve(this, amount) or this contract will not be able to do the transfer on your behalf.

params._amount: the amount of the token the user wishes to deposit

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._amount: uint of the amount of the token the user wishes to withdraw

AddBuilding(bytes32,bytes32).notice: function to Add building Uint in Game. Only Owner  can execute this function.

AddGemFromVillage(address,uint256).notice: function to add gem to player account. Only a village can execute.

AddTroops(bytes32,bytes32).notice: function to Add Troop in Game. Only Owner  can execute this function.

BuyUserVillage(uint256).notice: This function used to buy another user village

CancelSellOrder(uint256).notice: This function used to cancel sell village order

ChangeBuildingUpgrade(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: function to Add/Change Building Upgarde details. Only Owner  can execute this function.

ChangeTroopTrain(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: function to Change Troop Training details. Only Owner  can execute this function.

CreateToken(uint256,string,uint8,string).notice: This function is to create of ERC20 token (Gems in Game) only owner Can execute function.

CreateVillage().notice: This function handles creation of new village Requires Gems to create new village. Required Gems = (Number of Villages hold by user) * [(Town Basic Price) ** (Number of Villages hold by user)]

DeleteBuilding(uint256).notice: function to delete building Uint in Game. Only Owner  can execute this function.

DeleteTroops(uint256).notice: function to delete troop in Game. Only Owner  can execute this function.

DestroyUserVillage(address,uint256).notice: This function handles creation of new village Requires Gems to create new village. Required Gems = (Number of Villages hold by user) * [(Town Basic Price) ** (Number of Villages hold by user)]

GetAvailableSellOrders().notice: function to Get Filled Sell Orders .

GetBuildingUpgrades(uint256,uint256).notice: function to Get Building Upgarede Detail .

GetFilledSellOrders().notice: function to Get Filled Sell Orders .

GetPlayerGems(address).notice: function to Get Player Gem count

GetToopsDetails(uint256).notice: function to Get Troops training Detail .

GetVillages().notice: function to Get All Villages Excluding Caller Village.

SellUserVillage(address,uint256,uint256).notice: This function used to sell village

SubGemFromVillage(address,uint256).notice: function to substract gem from player account. Only a village can execute.

changeSellCommission(uint256).notice: his function handles changing of Town sell commission in Gems. Only Owner  can execute this function.

changeTownBasicPrice(uint256).notice: his function handles changing of Town basic price in Gems. Only Owner  can execute this function.

depositGemOwner(uint256).notice: function to deposite Gem on contract account balnace. Only Owner  can execute this function.

depositGems(uint256).notice: This function handles deposits of Gems to the contract. If token transfer fails, transaction is reverted and remaining gas is refunded.

withdrawGems(uint256).notice: his function handles withdrawals of Gems from the contract. If token transfer fails, transaction is reverted and remaining gas is refunded.
